statements: SELECT * FROM threat_actor_profiles;
SELECT actor_name, actor_country FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_country = 'USA';
SELECT actor_id, actor_name FROM threat_actor_profiles ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT actor_description FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_country = 'Russia' ORDER BY actor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_country = 'USA';
SELECT actor_name, actor_country FROM threat_actor_profiles ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, actor_description FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_country = 'China' OR actor_country = 'Russia';
SELECT actor_name, actor_description FROM threat_actor_profiles WHERE actor_country = 'USA' ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors ORDER BY threat_actor_id DESC;
SELECT name, organization, country FROM threat_actors WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM ttps WHERE type = 'Phishing' AND description LIKE '%social engineering%';
SELECT threat_actor_id, COUNT(ttp_id) AS ttp_count FROM ttps GROUP BY threat_actor_id HAVING ttp_count > 3;

SELECT name, organization, COUNT(ttp_id) AS ttp_count FROM threat_actors LEFT JOIN ttps ON threat_actors.threat_actor_id = ttps.threat_actor_id GROUP BY threat_actors.name, threat_actors.organization ORDER BY ttp_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, organization, country FROM threat_actors WHERE country = 'Russia' AND organization = 'Kremlin' ORDER BY threat_level ASC;
SELECT t.ttp_id, t.description, ta.name FROM ttps t JOIN threat_actors ta ON t.threat_actor_id = ta.threat_actor_id ORDER BY ta.name, t.description DESC;
SELECT ta.name AS ThreatActorName, COUNT(t.ttp_id) AS NumberOfTTPs FROM threat_actors ta LEFT JOIN ttps t ON ta.threat_actor_id = t.threat_actor_id GROUP BY ta.name ORDER BY NumberOfTTPs DESC;

SELECT ta.name AS ThreatActorName, AVG(t.threat_level) AS AvgThreatLevel FROM threat_actors ta LEFT JOIN ttps t ON ta.threat_actor_id = t.threat_actor_id GROUP BY ta.name HAVING AvgThreatLevel > 3 ORDER BY AvgThreatLevel DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors;
SELECT id, name FROM threat_actors;
SELECT description, name FROM threat_actors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ttps WHERE technique = 'Phishing';
SELECT id, description FROM threat_actors WHERE name = 'APT 28';
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM threat_actors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT technique FROM ttps;
SELECT t.technique, a.name FROM ttps t INNER JOIN actor_ttps at ON t.id = at.ttp_id INNER JOIN threat_actors a ON at.threat_actor_id = a.id;
SELECT name, description FROM threat_actors WHERE name LIKE '%APT%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors;
SELECT name, nationality, organization FROM threat_actors WHERE nationality='Russian';
SELECT t.technique_name, v.cve_id, v.published_date FROM ttps t JOIN vulnerabilities v ON t.ttp_id = v.ttp_id;
SELECT attack_type, targeted_system FROM attacks WHERE impact_description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT name AS actor_name, organization AS actor_organization FROM threat_actors ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors;
SELECT name, nationality, organization FROM threat_actors WHERE nationality = 'Russian';
SELECT t.technique_name, v.cve_id FROM ttps t JOIN vulnerabilities v ON t.ttp_id = v.ttp_id;
SELECT a.attack_type, a.targeted_system, t.technique_description FROM attacks a JOIN ttps t ON a.ttp_id = t.ttp_id;
SELECT t.technique_name, v.cve_id, a.attack_type FROM ttps t JOIN vulnerabilities v ON t.ttp_id = v.ttp_id JOIN attacks a ON t.ttp_id = a.ttp_id WHERE v.published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM threat_actors;
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM threat_actors ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors_ttps WHERE ttp_type='Social Engineering';
SELECT id, actor_id, description FROM actors_ttps WHERE description LIKE '%exploit%';
SELECT * FROM indicators WHERE indicator_type='IP' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE nationality = 'China';
SELECT actor_name, known_aliases FROM threat_actors WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM threat_actors WHERE actor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM actors_ttps JOIN threat_actors ON actors_ttps.actor_id = threat_actors.id WHERE ttp_type = 'Phishing' ORDER BY actor_name, ttp_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM actor_relations WHERE relation_type = 'Associate' AND actor2_id = 7 OR actor2_id = 10 ORDER BY actor1_id ASC, actor2_id DESC;
